data.name: Espresso
data.description: A full-flavored, concentrated form of coffee served in shots.

data.name: Cappuccino
data.description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso and a small amount of steamed milk.

data.name: Americano
data.description: Espresso shots topped up with hot water producing a strong, but varied in strength, coffee.

data.name: Latte
data.description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

data.name: Mocha
data.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and cocoa.

data.name: Macchiato
data.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.

data.name: Flat White
data.description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles).

data.name: Cortado
data.description: An espresso cut with a small amount of warm milk to reduce the acidity.

data.name: Affogato
data.description: A scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream topped or drowned with a shot of hot espresso.

data.name: Irish Coffee
data.description: A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and sugar, stirred, and topped with cream.

data.name: Frappe
data.description: A popular Greek foam-covered iced coffee drink made from instant coffee.

data.name: Viennese Coffee
data.description: A creamy blend of coffee and whipped cream, often topped with chocolate.

data.name: Turkish Coffee
data.description: An unfiltered coffee served in a small cup; it's very strong and dense with a unique taste.

data.name: Iced Coffee
data.description: Brewed coffee served cold, often with ice cubes.

data.name: Bulletproof Coffee
data.description: A drink consisting of brewed coffee, grass-fed butter, and a medium-chain triglyceride, such as coconut oil.

data.name: Ristretto
data.description: A short shot of espresso coffee made with the normal amount of ground coffee but extracted with about half the amount of water.

data.name: Black Eye Coffee
data.description: A strong coffee made by topping a cup of brewed coffee with a shot of espresso.

data.name: Caf√© au Lait
data.description: A French coffee drink, featuring equal parts of coffee and steamed milk, giving it a creamy and rich flavor.
